author: bridge-bot
content:
<parithoshj> perf-devnet-2 snapshots were successful!! :D
https://ethpandaops.io/data/snapshots/?snapshot-network=more&more-snapshot-network=perf-devnet-2

So we can continue with sync tests + bloating. @CPerezz has also deployed contracts in there which can be used by future tests. This would give us a really large state to run our local tests on for the future.

content: <KamilChNethermind> Nice so we can now revive stateful tests also
